item.title: 【Unreleased/Unofficial (lossless)】FLAC - Van Halen - That's Why I Love You (Unreleased 1998) [44.1KHz 16bit]
item.description:
Few would argue (including the musicians involved) that 1998's Van Halen III, the only album by the band to feature Extreme's singer Gary Cherone, was anything but an unmitigated artistic and commercial disaster. The arrangements are directionless, the music plodding and almost contrarian in its lack of discernable structure or melody, and Cherone, who has always acquitted himself well in other musical contexts, sounds frightened and frantic throughout. Given the lack of aesthetic judgment exercised by all involved, it's par for the course that "That's Why I Love You," which would have been the one really solid tune on the album, was not included. The sound on this demo is the best I could find. This track gives a glimpse into a parallel universe where Van Cherone showed some promise.

That's Why I Love You (Unreleased 1998).FLAC

+ Bonus because why not
It's The Right Time (1996 feat. Mitch Malloy).mp3
It's The Right Time (1996 w/ improvised guitar solo).mp3
